plot: RUBATO offers a glimpse into the passion and peculiarities of a one-of-a-kind voice teacher during a one-on-one classical lesson with an awkward, yet gifted, seventeen year old soprano.
title: Rubato
plot_es: RUBATO offers a glimpse into the passion and peculiarities of a one-of-a-kind voice teacher during a one-on-one classical lesson with an awkward, yet gifted, seventeen year old soprano.
plot_en: RUBATO offers a glimpse into the passion and peculiarities of a one-of-a-kind voice teacher during a one-on-one classical lesson with an awkward, yet gifted, seventeen year old soprano.
